title: Sourdough beer bread
ingredients: ['575g (400g for 1 loaf) strong white flour', '175g (100g for 1 loaf) granary flour', '500g (300g for 1 loaf) sourdough starter', '300g (200g for 1 loaf) Adnams Broadside or another strong ale', '5 teaspoons (2 teaspoons for 1 loaf) water', '1 tablespoon (1 1/2 teaspoons for 1 loaf) salt']
